title: How It Works in 3 Easy Steps

choose_plan.title: 1. Choose Your Plan
choose_plan.description: Select the data package that fits your travel needs and complete your purchase.

install_qr.title: 2. Install via QR Code
install_qr.description: We'll instantly email you a QR code. Scan it with your phone's camera to install your eSIM.

activate.title: 3. Activate on Arrival
activate.description: Once you land, turn on your eSIM in your phone's settings and you're instantly connected.
